attributes.action: Reverse mini budget changes Friday 23 September that are ruining the UK economy
attributes.additional_details: Who cares about the rate of inflation when the rate is mainly governed by sources beyond anyones control - a war!  Seek alternative economic advice as your current Advisors have let you down badly.  Do a U turn and do it now, otherwise a vote of no confidence will follow.
attributes.background: Immediately reverse the changes planned as they have created instability and uncertainty in the markets and is ruining peoples lives.  Interest rate increases threaten by the Bank of England are unreasonable when people have mortgages of £150K to £300K.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Scrap the mini-budget and ensure independent review of any replacement package
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623684
